author: NewsBreak Original
title: Officer Injured After Cruiser Collides With Vehicle, Hits Parked Car In CT Incident
text: A police officer was taken to a hospital after their cruiser collided with another vehicle while driving to the scene of a disturbance in Connecticut. The incident happened in Hartford County on Thursday, Dec. 28 just before 7:15 a.m., when Manchester Police officers were dispatched to an active disturbance call. According to the department, a marked patrol vehicle that was driving to the scene of this disturbance with lights and sirens activated had been traveling south on Main Street (Route 83) in the area of Pearl Street when another car abruptly turned left in front of it. The two vehicles then collided in the roadway. After the initial impact, the cruiser then hit an unoccupied parked car and came to rest on the Salvation Army property on Main Street, police said. The officer suffered minor injuries and was evaluated at a nearby hospital. The other driver was not injured, according to authorities. The crash is now under investigation. Anyone who saw the incident is asked to call Sergeant Augusto at 860-645-5500. Check back to Daily Voice for updates.

author: Grace O'Connor - Health & Science Editor
title: Older Women & HPV: Rising Cervical Cancer Risk
text:
Cervical Cancer Risk Rises with Age, Study Finds – HPV Remains a Threat for Women 65+ New research indicates that women over the age of 65 face a surprisingly elevated risk of developing cervical cancer due to Human Papillomavirus (HPV) infections, a risk that may be higher than that faced by younger women. The findings challenge conventional wisdom and underscore the need for continued screening and awareness, even in post-menopausal years.
For decades, cervical cancer screening programs have primarily focused on women in their 30s, 40s, and 50s. However, this large-scale study reveals a concerning trend: HPV infections, and the subsequent risk of cervical cancer, do not simply disappear with age. In fact, the risk may increase as the immune system naturally weakens with advancing years.
Understanding the Link Between HPV and Cervical Cancer Cervical cancer is most often caused by persistent infection with high-risk types of HPV, a common sexually transmitted infection. While many HPV infections clear up on their own, some can lead to precancerous changes in the cervix, which, if left untreated, can develop into cancer. Traditionally, the focus has been on vaccination for younger individuals to prevent initial infection. However, vaccination doesn’t eliminate existing infections, and the long-term effects of HPV in older women are now coming into sharper focus.
The immune system plays a crucial role in controlling HPV infections. As women age, their immune systems become less efficient, potentially allowing latent HPV infections to reactivate or persist, increasing the likelihood of cancerous development. This is particularly concerning as older women may have been exposed to HPV decades earlier, before widespread vaccination programs were in place.
Why Older Women May Be Underscreened Several factors contribute to lower screening rates among women over 65. Some women mistakenly believe they are no longer at risk after menopause, while others may experience discomfort or anxiety associated with screening procedures. Additionally, healthcare providers may be less likely to recommend screening for older women, assuming the risk is minimal. This study strongly suggests that these assumptions are inaccurate.
What role does long-term HPV infection play in the increased risk? The answer lies in the cumulative effect of viral persistence and the gradual decline in immune function. Even if an HPV infection was initially dormant, it can become active again, potentially leading to cellular changes over time.
Could changes in sexual activity or new partners later in life contribute to increased HPV exposure? While less common, new HPV exposures are possible at any age, and can contribute to the overall risk profile. It’s important to remember that HPV is transmitted through skin-to-skin contact, not just sexual intercourse.
The implications of these findings are significant. Healthcare providers need to re-evaluate screening guidelines and actively encourage women over 65 to undergo regular cervical cancer screening. Continued research is also needed to better understand the long-term effects of HPV in older women and to develop more effective prevention and treatment strategies.
Learn more about HPV and cervical cancer prevention from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the American Cancer Society .
Frequently Asked Questions About Cervical Cancer and HPV in Older Women What is the recommended age to stop cervical cancer screening? Current guidelines vary, but this research suggests that women should continue to be screened as long as they are in good health and have a life expectancy of 10 years or more. Discuss your individual risk factors with your healthcare provider. Is the HPV vaccine effective for women over 65? The HPV vaccine is most effective when administered before exposure to the virus. However, some healthcare providers may recommend it for women over 65 who have not previously been vaccinated and are sexually active, to protect against new HPV strains. What are the symptoms of cervical cancer in older women? Symptoms can include abnormal vaginal bleeding, pelvic pain, and changes in vaginal discharge. However, many women with early-stage cervical cancer experience no symptoms, highlighting the importance of regular screening. How often should women over 65 be screened for cervical cancer? Screening frequency should be determined in consultation with a healthcare provider, taking into account individual risk factors and health status. Options include Pap tests, HPV tests, or a combination of both. Can HPV cause other cancers in older women? Yes, HPV is linked to several other cancers, including vaginal, vulvar, anal, and oropharyngeal cancers. Older women should be aware of these risks and discuss them with their doctor. This research underscores a critical need for a paradigm shift in how we approach cervical cancer prevention. It’s no longer sufficient to assume that older women are protected simply by virtue of their age. Proactive screening and ongoing awareness are essential to safeguarding the health of this vulnerable population.
What steps will you take to discuss your cervical cancer screening options with your healthcare provider? And how can we better educate women about the ongoing risks of HPV infection throughout their lives?
Share this important information with your friends and family to help raise awareness about cervical cancer risk in older women.
Disclaimer: This article provides general information and should not be considered medical advice. Please consult with a qualified healthcare professional for personalized guidance and treatment.

author: @nbcchicago
title: Hamas says it accepts cease-fire proposal from Egyptian, Qatari mediators
text:
Hamas said it told Egyptian and Qatari negotiators that it has approved a cease-fire proposal to halt the war in Gaza, according to a press statement. Israel did not confirm whether it would accept or reject the deal that Hamas approved. Negotiations, which have been ongoing for months, intensified over the weekend, with facilitation from U.S. CIA Director William Burns, alongside mediators from Egypt and Qatar. Hamas said it told Egyptian and Qatari negotiators that it has approved a cease-fire proposal to halt the war in Gaza, according to a press statement.
Israel did not confirm whether it would accept or reject the deal that Hamas approved.
“We are exploring every single thing that we hear and we are exhausting the potential about negotiations and bringing back the hostages and that is our main mission to bring them home as quickly as possible,” Israel Defense Forces Officer Daniel Hagari said at a press briefing following Hamas’ announcement. “But in parallel, we are continuing to act in an operational manner, in the Gaza Strip and we will continue to do so.”
Negotiations intensified over the weekend, with facilitation from U.S. CIA Director William Burns, alongside mediators from Egypt and Qatar.
The negotiations came amid Israel’s ongoing threats to invade Gaza’s southernmost city of Rafah, which appeared imminent if a temporary cease-fire agreement was not reached.
U.S. officials have repeatedly warned Israel against an offensive in Rafah, where millions of civilians have taken refuge.
President Joe Biden reiterated that stance on a Monday call with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
Last week, the U.S. paused a shipment of weapons to Israel, including 2,000-pound bombs, as Israel continued to signal that a ground invasion of Rafah could be coming soon, two senior administration officials confirmed to NBC News.
On Monday, Israel ordered civilians in eastern Rafah to evacuate, adding to fears that Israel plans to invade the southern city.
Ali Jadallah | Anadolu | Getty Images Hundreds of Palestinians, including children, migrate from eastern neighborhoods after Israel warns them with pamphlets to evacuate Rafah, Gaza on May 06, 2024. NBC News previously reported that the deal would require Hamas to release 33 hostages in exchange for Israel agreeing to release Palestinian prisoners and pause military operations, which would ease the flow of humanitarian aid into Gaza.
This is developing news. Check back for updates.

author: 中国产业经济信息网
title: C909飞机首次交付老挝航空 我国商用飞机国际化发展迈出新步伐
text:
3月30日，中国商飞公司向老挝航空公司交付首架C909飞机，这是中国的喷气式客机首次进入老挝市场，标志着我国商用飞机国际化发展迈出新步伐。
　　这架编号为RDPL-34229的C909飞机采用90座全经济舱布局，内外部标识标牌为老挝语，外部涂装为定制化设计，机尾印有老挝国花占芭花。该机以租赁的形式交付老挝航空公司，将在老挝完成一系列准备工作后投入航线运营。
　　 C909飞机是我国自行研制的涡扇支线客机，航程2225至3700公里，可执飞大部分老挝国内及周边区域国际航线。此外，C909飞机具有良好的高温性能和短窄跑道起降能力，对东南亚区域的运营环境具有较强的适应性。该机型现已交付162架，累计运营645条航线，通航158座城市，安全运送旅客超2000万人次。
　　3月18日，老挝民航局向中国商飞公司颁发C909飞机型号接受证，意味着该机型已具备在老挝开展商业运行的基本条件。中国商飞公司成立专项团队，协助老挝航空公司开展手册准备、人员培训、航材保障、维修能力建设等多项准备工作，并派出包含飞行、乘务、运控、维修等多个专业的支持团队，全力保障C909飞机在老挝安全高效运行。
　　当前，老挝航空公司正在进行运力扩张和机队更新，此次租赁C909飞机有助于该航司进行运力补充和机队升级，更好地满足日益增长的老挝航空运输市场发展需求。

author: Laurie
title: TGIF: Feel-Good Friday Recipes to Kick Off the Weekend
text:
Forget the Monday blues! It’s Friday, and that means it’s time to celebrate with some delicious and easy-to-make recipes. Whether you’re craving something comforting, something healthy, or something simply indulgent, we’ve got you covered. Get ready to kick off the weekend with a smile and a full belly with these feel-good Friday recipes.
Air Fryer Risotto Balls (Arancini) Air Fryer Arancini or Air Fryer Italian Rice Balls — —Do you love Italian food? This is one of the best recipes! These make for a great appetizer or snack!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Arancini
Air Fryer Tortellini Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Crispy Spinach & Ricotta Fried Tortellini are excellent; there is nothing better than some Air Fryer Crispy Tortellini. This makes the perfect appetizer, snack, light lunch, or supper.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Crispy Spinach & Ricotta Fried Tortellini
Air Fryer Manicotti Air Fryer Manicotti — Do you ever crave a luxurious Italian meal but don’t want to try standing at the stovetop for hours? Well, now your dreams are answered with this delicious Air Fryer Manicotti recipe!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Manicotti
Air Fryer Roasted Olives Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Roasted Olives — Using your air fryer is a quick and easy way to make flavorful olives. These are perfect for a party or an appetizer. You can even use them as a pizza topping! The best part about this recipe is that it only takes 5 minutes of your time, plus you get the benefits of cooking in olive oil without having to turn on the oven!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Roasted Olives
Air Fryer Fried Olives Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Do you love fried olives? I know I do. But, I also know that frying them can be a bit of a pain. It’s messy and takes up a lot of oil. That’s why I’m so excited to share this air fryer fried olives recipe with you. Not only is it easier than traditional frying, but it still yields the same delicious results. Let me show you how it’s done!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Fried Olives
Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. There’s nothing better than a creamy, flavorful dinner that requires minimal effort. With an air fryer, you can make delicious meals in no time at all! Today, I will show you how to make Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells – combining the tastes of two classic Italian favorites into one hearty dish.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells
Air Fryer Lasagna Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Indulge in a comforting classic with a modern twist: Air Fryer Lasagna! Made with Italian sausage, 3 types of cheeses, and tender lasagna noodles, it’s hearty, comforting, and totally delicious! This easy air recipe is perfect for busy weeknights — plus it’s one of the best air fryer beginner recipes.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Lasagna
Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta is fantastic! This is a perfect summertime treat, with the fresh bounty of strawberries
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta
Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards — Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards are the perfect party appetizer! They are easy to assemble and can be made ahead of time.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards
Air Fryer Tomato Gallette If you are looking for an easy recipe this Christmas Season, reach no further than my recipe for Air Fryer Tomato Galette!
Air Fryer Tomato Galette
Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan My Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan are amazing! Topped with a mixture of cheese, breadcrumbs, and seasoning and then air fried until nice and crispy, they come out perfectly roasted every time. Prepped and ready in 20 minutes total.
Get the recipe : Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan
Air Fryer Babybel Cheese Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Make Air Fryer Babybel Cheese for a quick, easy, and healthy way to enjoy this snack food. The inside gets nice and gooey while the outside is crispy, seasoned perfection.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Babybel Cheese
Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli — Hey there, foodies and Trader Joe’s enthusiasts!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli
Air Fryer Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Recreate the classic Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli in your air fryer! Crispy, cheesy, and perfectly golden, this easy copycat recipe is the ultimate appetizer or snack.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli
Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Indulge in the irresistible crunch of Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta, filled with a medley of gooey, zesty cheeses. Resembling petite pasta mozzarella sticks, these fried delights are a flavor-packed sensation. Experience the magic of my Olive Garden-inspired Stuffed Ziti Fritta recipe and savor the explosion of flavors in every bite!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta
Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters –Introducing Air Fryer Cacio e Pepe Fritters – a delightful twist on the classic Roman pasta dish, transformed into bite-sized, crispy delights that promise to tantalize your taste buds.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters
Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli — Do you love air fryer recipes? Well, then you are going to love this Italian beef stromboli. It is a quick and easy recipe that only takes about 25 minutes from start to finish. Plus, it is so delicious! The combination of beef, cheese, and sauce flavors is just amazing. You are going to love this recipe!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli
Air Fryer Baked Ziti Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Baked Ziti — Calling all pasta lovers and cheese enthusiasts! Craving that warm, gooey, cheesy goodness of classic baked ziti but short on time and patience ?
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Baked Ziti
Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich is my new grilled cheese sandwich creation!! If you loved my classical Air Fryer Grilled Cheese, you would love this one.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Air Fryer Pizza Wontons Air Fryer Pizza Wontons — Dive into the world of crispy, cheesy goodness with our Air Fryer Pizza Wontons!
Air Fryer Pizza Wontons
Air Fryer Mug Pizza Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Pizza In A Mug — Looking for a quick and easy meal that’s sure to please? Look no further than air fryer pizza in a mug!
Get the recipe : air fryer mug pizza

author: 腾讯网
title: 被曝蒸馏DeepSeek还造假，欧版OpenAI塌房了_腾讯新闻
text: henry 发自 凹非寺量子位 | 公众号 QbitAI离职掀桌！Mistral被曝“蒸馏”DeepSeek。网友在推特上爆料，一位Mistral离职女员工群发邮件，直指公司多项黑幕。其中最劲爆的就是：Mistral最新模型疑似直接蒸馏自DeepSeek，却对外包装成RL成功案例，并刻意歪曲基准测试结果。说到Mistral，这家公司被誉为欧洲版OpenAI，是全球开...
